mapper.select: select accountId, userName, password, sex, phoneNumber from user;
mapper.insert: insert into user(accountId, userName, password, sex, phoneNumber) values (#{accountId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{phoneNumber})
insert into directory(name, lastMovedTime, parentDirId, ownerId, realPath) values (#{name}, #{lastMovedTime}, #{parentDirId}, #{ownerId}, #{realPath})
